table.name: perfm_thresh_notify
table.description: Profile for Metric Alert Notification. Defines recipients and actions to take on the alert.

columns.name: CONSOLIDATION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Time for consolidation of disparate thresholds for this notification profile. I.e., send a single notification in this time period, containing a list of all thresholds exceeded.

columns.name: TRIGGER_QDLOGS
columns.description: If Y, a qdlogs request will be made along with the notification. The notification e-mail will include the qdlogs archive name.

columns.name: TRIGGER_QDLOGS_JRA
columns.description: If 'Y', a JRA recording should be grabbed when qdlogs are triggered.

columns.name: TRIGGER_QDLOGS_HEAP_DUMP
columns.description: If 'Y', a heap dump should be grabbed when qdlogs are triggered.

columns.name: TRIGGER_PERF_COLLECTION
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of Performance collectors to retrieve and attach as a zip file to the notification. Also supports 'STANDARD' and 'ALL' collections.

columns.name: IS_RESERVED
columns.description: If ''Y'', the record is reserved for use with OTM staged thresholds. It cannot be edited or removed by a user.
